rows.label: qst200201_msg0001
rows.name:
So, Rex. Will going to Eden really
bring people happiness?

rows.label: qst200201_msg0002
rows.name:
I can't say anything for sure yet,
but that's what I choose to believe.

rows.label: qst200201_msg0005
rows.name:
I've seen a lot of different people
during the missions I've completed.

rows.label: qst200201_msg0006
rows.name:
This world is full of people suffering
for all kinds of reasons.

rows.label: qst200201_msg0007
rows.name:
People who are tricked by others and
lose their homes. People who resort to
killing in order to survive.

rows.label: qst200201_msg0008
rows.name:
Some even betray their own families
for the sake of money.

rows.label: qst200201_msg0009
rows.name: When I see all that, I... I just...

rows.label: qst200201_msg0010
rows.name:
I want to smack some sense into
the lot of them!

rows.label: qst200201_msg0011
rows.name:
I want to give them a taste of my
burning passion, and set their hearts
back on the right path!

rows.label: qst200201_msg0013
rows.name:
Protecting the weak, and passing
judgment on the strong!

rows.label: qst200201_msg0014
rows.name: That's what I believe my power is for.

rows.label: qst200201_msg0015
rows.name:
But if I'm gonna set the fire of justice
burning in this world, I'm gonna need
your help! That's all I wanted to say.
